prompt: Generate diverse and realistic customer feedback text that expresses negative sentiment. The feedback should convey dissatisfaction, frustration, or disappointment with a product, service, or experience. Include a wide range of contexts such as online shopping, restaurant visits, customer support interactions, app usage, travel experiences, or subscription services. Use varied tones (e.g., angry, sarcastic, disappointed, formal, passive-aggressive) and lengths (from short complaints to detailed critical reviews). Incorporate different perspectives, such as feedback from younger or older customers, or from different cultural backgrounds. Include subtle or nuanced negativity (e.g., mild frustration or polite criticism) alongside strong complaints. Examples could include criticism of poor quality, delays, unhelpful staff, technical issues, misleading advertising, or unpleasant experiences.
response:
I ordered a jacket that looked great online, but what arrived was poorly stitched and two sizes too small.  
The waitstaff at the restaurant seemed overwhelmed and forgot our order twice, which made for a frustrating evening.  
I tried to reach customer support for hours, and when I finally did, the representative was unhelpful and dismissive.  
My subscription box arrived late and contained items that felt cheap and not at all what was advertised.  
I was excited to try the new app, but it crashed repeatedly, making it impossible to use.  
The hotel room was nothing like the pictures online; it was outdated and not very clean.  
I bought a book from the online store, but it arrived damaged and the return process took forever.  
The food was cold when it finally came to our table, and the manager didn’t seem to care at all.  
I signed up for the trial, but the cancellation process was so convoluted that I ended up being charged.  
The flight was delayed for hours without any updates, and the staff were unresponsive to our questions.  
I was really looking forward to the concert, but the sound quality was terrible and we couldn't hear anything.  
The app promised a smooth experience, but I faced constant glitches that ruined my whole experience.  
I felt like I was invisible at the restaurant; no one checked on us during our meal.  
The product description was misleading, and I ended up with something completely different than expected.  
I was disappointed with the quality of the shoes; they started falling apart after just a week.  
The package arrived with missing items, and it took days to get a response from customer service.  
I tried to return the dress because it didn’t fit, but the return policy was confusing and frustrating.  
I ordered a pizza that took over an hour to arrive, and it was cold when it finally got here.  
The staff at the store were rude and unhelpful, making my shopping experience quite unpleasant.  
My vacation was ruined by constant issues with the rental car, and the support team was no help at all.  
I was excited about the new café, but the coffee was burnt and the pastries were stale.  
The online course I signed up for was poorly organized and didn’t deliver on its promises.  
The delivery was late, and I received no communication from the company about the delay.  
I had a terrible experience trying to check in; the staff seemed disorganized and overwhelmed.  
I expected more from the hotel based on the reviews, but it fell short in almost every aspect.  
The app is full of bugs, and I can’t even access my account without it crashing.  
I waited over an hour for my food, and when it came, it was completely wrong.  
The quality of the products has declined sharply; I won’t be buying again anytime soon.  
I was treated poorly at the restaurant, and my complaint was brushed off by the manager.  
The subscription service promised great content, but most of it feels recycled and unoriginal.  
The airline lost my luggage, and I’ve been trying to get updates for days with no luck.  
I ordered a custom cake for my birthday, and it didn’t even resemble what I requested.  
The customer service team was unprofessional and seemed uninterested in resolving my issue.  
I expected better from the brand; the product feels cheap and not worth the price.  
The hotel amenities were advertised as luxury, but they were outdated and poorly maintained.  
My experience was ruined by the rude staff; it’s disappointing how they treat customers.  
The online order process was confusing, and I ended up with the wrong item entirely.  
I had to wait too long for a response from customer service, and when they replied, they were unhelpful.  
The travel agency promised a smooth trip but didn't deliver on any of their promises.  
I was really disappointed with my meal; it was bland and lacked any flavor.  
The app is not user-friendly at all; I can’t find what I need without getting frustrated.  
The service was slow, and the staff seemed overwhelmed; I felt neglected during my visit.  
I received a faulty product, and getting a replacement has been a nightmare.  
The online class was poorly structured, making it hard to follow along and learn anything.  
The hotel room was noisy and uncomfortable; I couldn't get a decent night's sleep.  
I had high expectations for the event, but it was poorly organized and not worth the ticket price.  
I waited over two weeks for my order, and when it finally arrived, it was the wrong item.  
The food at the buffet was undercooked, and the staff seemed uninterested in addressing complaints.  
I found the process to cancel my subscription to be unnecessarily complicated and frustrating.  
The tour guide was uninformative, which made the whole experience less enjoyable.  
I was disappointed with my online shopping experience; the wrong size was sent, and returns are difficult.  
The customer support was unresponsive, leaving me feeling frustrated and unheard.  
I had a terrible experience with the taxi service; the driver was rude and the car was dirty.
